text: Germanodactylus is an extinct genus from the pterosaur order, and it lived in what is now England and China. It's estimated that males and females could grow up to a different meter in size. This species was an enemy to the early bird Archaeopteryx. == Media == To date, Germanodactylus appeared only in the fictional Savage Land, and the horror movie known as Pterodactyl. In the movie, it was depicted as being dangerous to humans, as well as lacking a species name. Category:Pterosaurs Category:Extinct species Category:Jurassic
title: Germanodactylus
